if.test: dt_typ != null and dt_typ != '' and stt_dt != null and stt_dt != '' and end_dt != null and end_dt != ''
srch_typ == 'trct_actp' and srch_val != null and srch_val !=''
srch_typ == 'trct_chpr' and srch_val != null and srch_val !=''
srch_typ == '' and srch_val != null and srch_val !=''
bswr_dmnd_stat_typ != null and bswr_dmnd_stat_typ !='' and (bswr_dmnd_stat_cd == null or bswr_dmnd_stat_cd =='')

if.if: AND TRCT_BOX_ID IN (SELECT TRCT_BOX_ID FROM TB_TRCT_CHPR_ADMN WHERE USER_ID = #{trct_chpr_id})

if.test: trct_chpr_id != null and trct_chpr_id !='' and (bswr_dmnd_stat_typ == null or bswr_dmnd_stat_typ =='') and (bswr_dmnd_stat_cd == null or bswr_dmnd_stat_cd =='')
bswr_dmnd_stat_typ != null and bswr_dmnd_stat_typ !='' and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd != null and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd
bswr_dmnd_stat_cd != null and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd !='' and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd == '00'
trct_chpr_id != null and trct_chpr_id !='' and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd != null and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd !='' and bswr_dmnd_stat_cd != '00'
bswr_dmnd_stat_typ != null and bswr_dmnd_stat_typ !='' and (bswr_dmnd_stat_cd == null or bswr_dmnd_stat_cd =='')
if.if: AND (TRCT_CHPR_ID = #{trct_chpr_id} AND BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD > '00' AND BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD < '30' OR BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD = '00')

where.if:
AND TRCT_CONS_ATMT_CMPL_YN = 'N' AND BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD > '20' AND CONS_STAT_CD != '30'
AND TRCT_ACTP_ID = #{trct_actp_id}

mapper.update:
SELECT 'BWD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SEQ_COMMON.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO /* BswrDmndDtlMap.insertBswrDmndDtl */ TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL ( BSWR_DMND_ID, CONSNO, BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD, CONS_ATMT_CMPL_YN, TRCT_BOX_ID , TRCT_ACPG_DEPT_CD, TRCT_ACTP_ID, TRCT_ACPG_DTTM, BSWR_DMND_ACPG_CNTN, CNTR_CD , RGSR_ID, RGSN_DTTM, AMND_ID, AMNT_DTTM) VALUES ( #{bswr_dmnd_id}, #{consno}, '00', #{cons_atmt_cmpl_yn}, #{trct_box_id} , #{trct_acpg_dept_cd}, #{trct_actp_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{bswr_dmnd_acpg_cntn}, #{cntr_cd} , #{rgsr_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{amnd_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
mapper.select:
SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getDpmsReslDsps */ NVL(B.TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT, 0) AS TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT , NVL(B.PRGR_CSCNT, 0) AS PRGR_CSCNT , NVL(B.CMPL_CSCNT, 0) AS CMPL_CSCNT , NVL(ROUND(CMPL_CSCNT/DECODE(TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT,0,1,TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT)*100,1), 0) AS CMPL_RT , NVL(ROUND(PRGR_CSCNT/DECODE(TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT,0,1,TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT)*100,1), 0) AS PRGR_RT FROM (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD='10' OR BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD='20' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PRGR_CSCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD='30' OR BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD='40' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS CMPL_CSCNT , SUM(CNT) AS TOTAL_TRGT_CSCNT FROM (SELECT BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL WHERE CNTR_CD = #{cntr_cd} AND TRCT_CHPR_ID = #{trct_chpr_id} AND TRCT_BOX_ID IN (SELECT TRCT_BOX_ID FROM TB_TRCT_CHPR_ADMN WHERE USER_ID = #{trct_chpr_id})
AND ${dt_typ} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '235959'
AND ${dt_typ} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') || '235959'
AND ${dt_typ} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D'), 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '235959'
AND ${dt_typ} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '01000000' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '235959'
GROUP BY BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD ) A ) B

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getTrctConsCount */ COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.* , (SELECT TRCT_TYP_CD FROM TB_TRCT_BOX_ADMN WHERE TRCT_BOX_ID = A.TRCT_BOX_ID) AS TRCT_TYP_CD , (SELECT TEAM_NM FROM TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = A.TRCT_ACPG_DEPT_CD AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_ACPG_DEPT_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.TRCT_ACTP_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_ACTP_NM , (SELECT TEAM_NM FROM TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = A.TRCT_CHPR_DEPT_CD AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_CHPR_DEPT_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.TRCT_CHPR_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_CHPR_NM , A.CONS_ATMT_CMPL_YN AS TRCT_CONS_ATMT_CMPL_YN , C.CONS_STAT_CD FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL A LEFT JOIN TB_CONS C ON A.CONSNO = C.CONSNO AND A.CNTR_CD = C.CNTR_CD ) A

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getTrctConsHstrCount */ COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.* , AA.CONSNO , (SELECT TRCT_TYP_CD FROM TB_TRCT_BOX_ADMN WHERE TRCT_BOX_ID = A.TRCT_BOX_ID) AS TRCT_TYP_CD , (SELECT TEAM_NM FROM TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = A.TRCT_ACPG_DEPT_CD AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_ACPG_DEPT_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.TRCT_ACTP_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_ACTP_NM , (SELECT TEAM_NM FROM TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = A.TRCT_CHPR_DEPT_CD AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_CHPR_DEPT_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.TRCT_CHPR_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_CHPR_NM FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL_HSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL AA ON A.BSWR_DMND_ID = AA.BSWR_DMND_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CONS C ON AA.CONSNO = C.CONSNO
) E

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getTrctConsChartWeeksList */ TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD') || '(' || DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'D'), 1, '일', 2, '월', 3, '화', 4, '수', 5, '목', 6, '금', 7, '토') || ')' AS X , NVL(ING_CNT, 0) AS ING_CNT , NVL(COM_CNT, 0) AS COM_CNT FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(${dt_typ}, 1, 8) AS ACPG_DT , SUM(CASE WHEN (BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD = '10' OR BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD = '20') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ING_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN (BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD = '30' OR BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD = '40') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS COM_CNT FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL A WHERE A.CNTR_CD = #{cntr_cd} AND A.TRCT_CHPR_ID = #{trct_chpr_id}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(${dt_typ}, 1, 8) ) A , (SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 6) - TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 1 ) B WHERE A.ACPG_DT(+) = B.DT ORDER BY B.DT ASC

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getTodoConsTrctHstrCount */ A.CNTR_CD, A.TRCT_ACTP_ID AS USER_ID , COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL A LEFT JOIN TB_CONS C ON A.CONSNO = C.CONSNO AND A.CNTR_CD = C.CNTR_CD WHERE A.CONS_ATMT_CMPL_YN = 'N' AND A.BSWR_DMND_STAT_CD > '20' AND C.CONS_STAT_CD != '30' GROUP BY A.CNTR_CD, A.TRCT_ACTP_ID

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.checkTrctChpr */ TRCT_CHPR_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.TRCT_CHPR_ID AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_CHPR_NM , (SELECT TEAM_NM FROM TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = A.TRCT_CHPR_DEPT_CD AND CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD) AS TRCT_CHPR_DEPT_NM FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL A WHERE BSWR_DMND_ID = #{bswr_dmnd_id}

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getTrctConsStatCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_CD WHERE CD_SET_CD='CNS160' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CD < '30'
AND CD >= '30'

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getTrctConsStatList */ * FROM TB_CD WHERE CD_SET_CD='CNS160' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CD < '30'
AND CD >= '30'

SELECT /* BswrDmndDtlMap.getConsTrctBoxChprCount */ B.USER_ID, A.CNTR_CD, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_BSWR_DMND_DTL A , TB_TRCT_CHPR_ADMN B WHERE A.TRCT_CHPR_ID IS NULL AND A.TRCT_BOX_ID = B.TRCT_BOX_ID GROUP BY B.USER_ID, A.CNTR_CD
